field.name: summary
field.value: Permit call to reach "non-proxied" methods of inherited interfaces.

field.name: description
field.value:
Enhance the current behaviour for handling non-proxied methods defined in inherited interfaces of a target interface being proxied to reach the target method. Please refer to attached file for complete example.
The current implementation of proxy with target interface makes no assumption for presence of implementation to supplied additional interfaces. Discussion can be found on discussion group titled: "IProxyGenerationHook on methods at inherited interface level"
